properties.entry: In this page the user will find short video tutorials which will guide her/him through the specific sections and functions of the EU DEVFIN software. The max length of each video will be 8 minutes.<p/> The videos will be available end of September 2014, when the final version of the EU-DEVFIN software is released.
EU DEVFIN How to Guide 1 browse thru the main menu
EU DEVFIN How to Guide 2 Input a new ODA transaction
EU DEVFIN How to Guide 3 aggregate transactions and other input features
EU DEVFIN How to Guide 4 Generate DAC official reports
EU DEVFIN How to Guide 5 Generate analytical reports
EU DEVFIN How to Guide 6 Generate exports
EU DEVFIN How to Guide 7 Use the Admin menu
EU DEVFIN How to Guide 8 Be an effective Administrator
EU DEVFIN How to Guide 9 Promote transparency
